name: Counter Terrorist Bravo Team
description:
Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter ?

Counter Terrorist Bravo Team is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard. Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!

The best first person shooter game, if you want to play counter terrorist role game. Here is the game.

Enjoy.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
